    • setupBoard

      public void setupBoard() throws BagEmptyException
      Set up the game board by randomly adding the students to the islands and instantiating the cloud cards. In this case 3 advanced cards are also picked and made playable.
      Overrides:
      setupBoard in class Game
      Throws:
      BagEmptyException - if the bag is empty while drawing a student from it. (impossible to verify in this scenario since this method is called at the beginning of the match, when the bag is full)

    • moveStudentToDiningHall

      public void moveStudentToDiningHall(Player player, ColorCharacter color) throws TooManyStudentsException
      In addition to move students to the dining hall, if the number of students on the dining hall becomes multiple of 3, give the player a coin.
      Overrides:
      moveStudentToDiningHall in class Game
      Parameters:
      player - current player moving student
      color - color of student
      Throws:
      TooManyStudentsException - dining table of given color is full
      See Also:
      • current player
